Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., on target. Hit: 15 (3d8+2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (2d8+1) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

Actions.Name: Constrict
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: The creature is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 15 (3d8+2) bludgeoning damage on the start of its turns. While Constricting, the millipede may not move or Constrict another creature but may still Bite.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., on target. Hit: 20 (3d10+4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 15 (2d10+4) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

Actions.Name: Constrict
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: The creature is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 20 (3d10+4) bludgeoning damage on the start of its turns. While Constricting, the millipede may not move or Constrict another creature but may still Bite or Spray.

Actions.Name: Spray
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10+4) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become blinded for 1 hour.

Actions.Name: Rock
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (4d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The wingmistress makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its wings.

Actions.Name: Claws
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d6) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Wings
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., all creatures within range. Hit: 3 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The harpy makes two attacks with its claws.

Actions.Name: Claws
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Chain Lightning
Actions.Content: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 40 ft. one target. Hit: 4d6 lightning damage. The lighting then arcs to the nearest enemy within 40 ft. who has not yet been hit by Chain Lightning this round. This process continues until there are no valid targets or the attack misses.

Actions.Name: Luring Song
Actions.Content:
The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 ft. of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is incapacitated.
     While charmed by the harpy, a target is incapacitated and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the charmed target is more than 5 ft. away from the harpy, the must move on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.
     A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

satyr_marksman.Name: satyr marksman
satyr_marksman.Type: Medium fey, monster manual, chaotic neutral

Traits.Name: Magic Resistance
Traits.Content: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The satyr makes two attacks with its shortsword or longbow in any combination.

Actions.Name: Shortsword
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Longbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Variant: Panpipes
Actions.Content: Gentle Lullaby. The creature falls asleep and is unconscious for 1 minute. The effect ends if the creature takes damage or if someone takes an action to shake the creature awake.

satyr_charger.Name: satyr charger
satyr_charger.Type: Medium fey, monster manual, chaotic neutral

Traits.Name: Magic Resistance
Traits.Content: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Actions.Name: Kick
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.Name: Ram
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is medium or smaller it is pushed 20 ft away from the satyr and if stopped by any objects takes an additional (3) 1d6 bludgeoning damage. To make this attack the satyr must run at least 15 feet in a straight line before hitting its target. The target does not trigger attacks of opportunity while being pushed.

Actions.Name: Variant: Panpipes
Actions.Content: Gentle Lullaby. The creature falls asleep and is unconscious for 1 minute. The effect ends if the creature takes damage or if someone takes an action to shake the creature awake.

Traits.Name: Underminer
Traits.Content: If the tunneler passes under an enemy while burrowed, that creature must make a DC 13 Dex saving throw, becoming prone on a failed save.

Traits.Name: Pack Tactics
Traits.Content: The ankheg tunneler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the ankhegs's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage .

Actions.Name: Poison Stinger
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (5d8 + 12) poison damage. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On failure, they are poisoned.

Actions.Name: Blood Frenzy (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: Until the start of the queen's next turn, all ankheg allies that start their turns within 40 ft. of the queen enter a frenzy. While in a frenzy, ankhegs have advantage on Strength checks and saving throws; they have +2 to all ranged and melee weapon attacks; and have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. An ankheg's frenzy ends if it is knocked unconscious. The frenzy does not end if the queen dies.

Actions.Name: Defend the Hive (Recharge 6)
Actions.Content: The queen summons nearby ankhegs to the fray. Roll a d6. On 1-3, drones come to her aid; on 4-5, ankheg tunnelers come; and on 6, ankhegs come. Roll another d6, this many of the specified enemy appear, coming up through unoccupied spaces of digable material (dirt, sand, etc.). If there is not enough room, they are not summoned. The new creatures take their turns immediately before the queen.
